com.convert

Class confluenceConvert

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.convert.confluenceConvert

  • public class confluenceConvert
extends java.lang.Object
    Confluence2Mediawiki Converter - Reads a loki URL from the convert.properties file located in the directory. Converts and downloads all confluence files listed at that URL. Downloads all attatchments found in the resource folder.
    Author:
    Emilio Zand
